dcterms:creator: N. Labra-Avila
dcterms:description: The Extended Short Bundles Atlas (ESBA) is a comprehensive atlas of short white matter bundles, built from subjects registered to the MNI space using a sulcus-driven registration method. It includes 657 bundles and is designed to address the challenges of superficial white matter tractography parcellation.
dcterms:title: Extended Short Bundles Atlas (ESBA)

dcterms:creator: D. C. Van Essen
S. M. Smith
D. M. Barch
T. E. J. Behrens
E. Yacoub
K. Ugurbil
dcterms:description: The HCP database is a large-scale dataset from the Human Connectome Project, providing extensive neuroimaging data for studying brain connectivity and organization.
dcterms:title: HCP database

dcterms:creator: B. Schmitt
A. Lebois
D. Duclap
P. Guevara
F. Poupon
D. Rivi√®re
dcterms:description: The ARCHI dataset is an open database designed to infer atlases of human brain connectivity, providing data for the analysis of brain networks.
dcterms:title: ARCHI dataset

dcterms:description: The UKBiobank dataset is a large-scale biomedical database containing health-related data from a diverse population, used for various research purposes including brain imaging studies.
dcterms:title: UKBiobank dataset
